= JAVA WEB TOKEN(JWT) Pre Processor =

== Description ==

This is a Jmeter pre-processor plugin that can generate Java Web Token (JWT). When a JWT requires as a pre-requisite to send an HTTP request, this plugin can generate the JWT based on the details provided by the user. The JWT token is stored in a Jmeter variable which can use in other samplers like HTTP.

To generate the JWT String, the following data needs to specified:
  * Signing algorithm (HS256, RS256).
  * Secret Key
  * JWT header attributes (if any)
  * JWT payload attributes
  * Variable name to store the JWT value.
